member.name: T:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests
member.summary: Sends requests to datahub and returns responses.

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: DataHubRequest Constructor - Creates DataHubRequest object which surfaces the methods to interact with the DataHub
member.param: The base portion of the url.
HttpClient to use in application. If not provided, defaults to a new HttpClient.
member.example:
This shows how to construct the Object
DataHubRequests dhRequest = new DataHubRequests("https://test.data.com:8888/", "data/v1/employee", "UserName", "Pa$$w0rd");

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.SetHttpClientDefaults
member.summary: Sets the default values for the HttpClient: - BaseAddress set to BaseUrl - Clears Accept Header and sets to application\json - Sets Authorization header to Basic with Creds

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.Base64Credentials(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates Base64 Credential string for REST auth.

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.GetEmployeesAsync(System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)
member.summary: Gets an async response from the DataHub.
member.param: Collection of query strings to append to the endpoint. Default is null.

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.RunQueryAsync(System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)
member.summary: Sends the request. If more than 500 employees are returned, uses RunBatchesAsync() to get the full result.
member.param: Collection of query strings to append to the endpoint. Default is null.

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.RunBatchesAsync(System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)
member.summary: Used for more than 500 results. Runs GetEmployeesIdsOnlyAsync, groups the results by 100, then GetBatchEmployeesAsync queries each group of IDs, combines the results into an array of employees.
member.param: Collection of query strings to append to the endpoint. Default is null.

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.GetEmployeesIdsOnlyAsync(System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)
member.summary: Runs a query with the idsOnly param appended.
member.param: Collection of query strings to append to the endpoint. Default is null.
member.returns: Async DataHub Object, containing only Employee Ids. No limit on result length.

member.name: M:DataHubAPIClient.DataHubAPIRequests.DataHubRequests.GetBatchEmployeesAsync(System.Linq.IGrouping{System.Int32,System.String})
member.summary: Accepts an IGrouping of employeeIds then sends query for group results.
